version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Animated effects are now available on PicsArt GIF & Sticker Maker. How to use them? Click on 'GIF' button in the PicsArt app, get redirected to PicsArt GIF & Sticker Maker's page, select the effects you love to animate your stickers and share them on PicsArt.
More? You can add backgrounds to your animated stickers! When you are done - share them on PicsArt for everyone to see!!
